com.here.sdk.mapviewlite

Class MapPolylineStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.NativeBase
      • com.here.sdk.mapviewlite.MapPolylineStyle

  • public final class MapPolylineStyle
extends NativeBase

    A style that must be applied to a MapPolyline to determine its appearance when displayed. If no color is set, the map polyline will be invisible.

      • setWidthInPixels

        public void setWidthInPixels(double inPixels)

        Sets the width in pixels of a polyline to the given value.

        Parameters:
        inPixels -

        The width in which to draw the line. Defaults to 5.0d.

      • getWidthInPixels

        public double getWidthInPixels()

        Gets the currently set width of a polyline in pixels.

        Returns:

        The width in pixels.

      • setDrawOrder

        public void setDrawOrder(long order)

        Sets the order in which this map polyline will be drawn in relation to other map polylines. The order in which the map polylines are added to the map does not matter. When using predefined map styles, map polylines are always drawn under buildings and labels. They are always drawn below other map polygons and map circles.

        Parameters:
        order -

        Draw order, where a higher value means that this map item is drawn later. Maximum value is 1000. Defaults to 0.

      • getDrawOrder

        public long getDrawOrder()

        Gets the currently set draw order in which this map polyline will be drawn in relation to other map polylines.

        Returns:
